title: NADRA to open 46 new centers at Tehsil level by August 14, PM told
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 6 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan was on Tuesday told that National Database and Registration Authority (NADRA) will open its 46 new centers at Tehsil level by August 14 this year, which will ensure common manâ€™s access to NADRA.
He was told this by Chairman NADRA Muhammad Tariq Malik, who called on him here. Attorney General Khalid Javed was also present.
The Prime Minister was further told that NADRA, under the vision of Digital Pakistan, besides introducing innovative applications for the assistance of startups will also help the Federal Board of Revenue (FBR) in broadening the tax-base.
The Prime Minister while appreciating the measures being taken by NADRA stressed that the provision of facilities to common man was foremost priority of the present government.
